name: Emily and the fireflies
description:
Emily is scared, of flies, and fire, and especially fireflies.
Bring her home by scaring her in the right direction.

Known issues:

Level 4: Missing rain effect, causing it to be invisible. Also missing smooth wall physics at several places.
Level 5 (aka 3+): Missing rain collider (makes it easier than it's supposed to be).
Level 6: Trigger happy fly killing Emily, even without that, is it even possible?

Web build containing fixes for level 4 and 3+ 

Note, the web build is created after the deadline, if you want to rate the submitted game fairly, please use the windows version.
